docs.summary: Provides functionality related to user input elements.

docs.summary: Sets or gets an element's value.

srcDocs.summary: Sets or gets an element's value.

params.name: handler
params.doc:
The name of the function or
 the function expression to run when the element's value changes.

The name of the function or
 the function expression to run when the element's value changes.

ret.doc: The element on which the event is now registered.
ret.srcDoc: The element on which the event is now registered.

docs.summary:
Adds an event handler that runs when an input element's value
 is changed.
description: An element receives a `change` event when a user changes the value

examples.title: Print a message to the console when the user changes the value of either of two page elements

srcDocs.summary:
Adds an event handler that runs when an input element's value
 is changed.
description: An element receives a `change` event when a user changes the value
A `change` event is not triggered when you change an element's value using
